summary: Request to implement stress testing capability for the TypeScript SDK to verify correctness under load, ensure no crashes or memory leaks, and publish results for transparency about alpha release performance expectations.
userImpact: Users need confidence that the alpha SDK can handle realistic workloads without crashes or memory leaks.
keyQuote: To make sure we operate correctly under mild load and don't crash or leak memory. We should publish the results so people know what to expect from the alpha release.
